pages.text: The $(mob)Energetic Sheep$() is a variant of the $(l:minecraft_sheep)$(mob)Sheep$(). It generates $(thing)Redstone Flux$() whenever it eats $(item)Grass$() to regrow its $(item)Energetic Wool$(), which also makes it move faster. It can then be extracted by various means, such as $(item)Energetic Shears$().

$(mob)Energetic Sheeps$() drop $(item)Energetic Wool$() on death or when sheared with normal $(item)Shears$(). It is similar to $(l:minecraft_sheep)$(mob)Wool$(), but stores $(thing)Redstone Flux$() which can be extracted with any machine that can extract $(thing)Redstone Flux$() out of items. It also hurts on touch.
